channel.title: Homes on Dave Parfitt's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Dave Parfitt's blog

item.title: about
item.description: Biography I am a software engineer in Buffalo, NY with a focus on backend + distributed systems. I currently work remotely for Mozilla as a Senior Site Reliability Engineer, where I design and run global cloud infrastructure for mozilla.org and MDN on Kubernetes. Previously, I worked at Chef, where I was a core engineer on Habitat and an engineering lead for Chef Analytics. I also worked at Basho on Riak multi data center replication.
